attributes.additional_details: Covid Infections in the UK have been rising sharply since the start of October and are currently among the highest in the world. We must not make the same mistakes again. We need to learn the lessons of the past and act fast, or else we will face far more extreme measures later.
attributes.background: The Government should act now and enact plan B in England with extra restrictions such as masks, vaccine passports and advice to work from home.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Enact ‘Plan B’ to help keep people and our NHS well this winter.:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599507
